means: （不动脑筋）机械行事的人，机器人

word_mean: 无性〔繁殖〕系，纯系：由一个亲本经无性生殖得到的一个或一群遗传学上相同的细胞、生物体或植物
也指由一个杂合DNA分子(重组体载体)在一个真核细胞或细菌宿主细胞中复制而得的一群DNA
用作动词表示建立无性繁殖系
由一个共同祖先无性繁殖的一群遗传上同一的脱氧核糖核酸分子、细胞或个体所组成的特殊生命群体。
（1）又称“无性[繁殖]系”。遗传组成完全相同的分子、细胞或个体及其组成的一个群体。（2）利用体外重组技术将某特定的基因或DNA序列插入载体分子的操作过程。

sentence.Network_en: Tom was in some ways a younger clone of his handsome father.
sentence.Network_cn: 汤姆某些地方长得和他那帅气的父亲一模一样，只是年轻一些。

sentence.Network_en: A team from the UK were the first to successfully clone an animal.
sentence.Network_cn: 英国的一个小组率先克隆动物成功。

sentence.Network_en: At the outset they must contain several ramets of every selected clone.
sentence.Network_cn: 在开始时每个入选无性系必须包括几个无性繁殖后代.

encyclopedia.content: 无性繁殖的英文名称叫"Clone"，译音为"克隆"，实际上，英文的"Clone"起源于希腊文 "Klone"，原意是用"嫩枝"或"插条"繁 殖。时至今日，"克隆"的含义已不仅仅是"无性繁殖"，凡来自一个祖先，经过无性繁殖出的一群个体，也叫"克隆"。

entry.def: If  someone or something is a clone of another person or thing, they are so similar to this person or thing that they seem to be exactly the same as them.

example.ex: Tom was in some ways a younger clone of his handsome father...
example.tran: 汤姆某些地方长得和他那帅气的父亲一模一样，只是年轻一些。

example.ex: Designers are mistaken if they believe we all want to be supermodel clones.
example.tran: 要是设计师认为所有人都想和超模一样，那他们就错了。

entry.tran: 克隆动物(或植物);无性繁殖动物(或植物)
entry.def: A clone is an animal or plant that has been produced artificially, for example in a laboratory, from the cells of another animal or plant. A clone is exactly the same as the original animal or plant.

entry.tran: 克隆;以无性繁殖技术复制
entry.def: To clone an animal or plant means to produce it as a clone.

example.ex: The idea of cloning extinct life forms still belongs to science fiction.
example.tran: 克隆已经灭绝的生物的想法仍旧只限于科幻小说中。

means.word_mean: 1. a person who is almost identical to another
2. a group of genetically identical cells or organisms derived from a single cell or individual by some kind of asexual reproduction

auth_sentence.content: "This is the Pando Clone," O'Brien says.

Sentence.sentence: Behind the differences in sex, skin tones and mother tongues, there are common attitudes, expectations and ambitions which risk creating a set of clones among the business leaders of the future.

jushi.english: The new computer is yet another IBM clone.
jushi.chinese: 这种新电脑不过是IBM公司产品的一种翻版。
